attributes.action: Stop parking charges for NHS staff within NHS hospitals in England.
attributes.additional_details:
The government and NHS England and hospital sites have stopped charging staff within the Covid-19 pandemic for parking. This needs to continue on a permanent basis. Staff have already this week recived fines and additional charges. 
This ruling if susseful needs to apply to all sites inclusive of any privately run PFI sites.
attributes.background: Implement an Act or Bill as have devolved governments within the UK have achieved where parking charges for NHS staff within NHS sites have been removed, permanently.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560696
